ourProductsBody.value: Our products designed to be integrated into the surgical procedure without affecting standard practice and with a minimal learning curve. Our development process includes rigorous scientific programs Including randomized clinical trials conducted at leading medical centers in Europe and the US

Our development process includes rigorous scientific programs Including randomized clinical trials conducted at leading medical centers in Europe and the US

synopsis.value: Vascular Graft Solutions (VGS) is a leading developer of innovative technologies to improve surgical revascularization, vascular reconstruction procedures, and arteriovenous fistula. Our integrity and research-driven development have positioned us closely to healthcare professionals, enabling us to solve complex challenges in cardiac and vascular surgery. We are improving the standard-of-care in cardiovascular surgery while focusing on patients' quality-of-life, surgeons, and health economics.
